name: Master Hunter Desert: Archey Shoot
description:
Master Hunter Desert: Archey Shoot - Enjoy this entertaining shooting game. You can develop your archery skills and become the king of hunter.
Features:
- Realistic 3D environment having African, Deserts and a beautiful lake.
- Wonderful 3D graphics and realistic animations.
- Ancient archery player with old hunter dress.
- Accurate bow shooting
- smooth controls
- Real time game play animations
